# Awesome Claude Code

> Claude Code extension for PHP with DDD, CQRS, Clean Architecture generators, and documentation tools.

## Quick Facts

- 26 commands, 57 agents, 242 skills, 21 hooks
- PHP 8.5, PSR-12, readonly classes
- DDD/CQRS/Hexagonal patterns
- Testing, Documentation generation and audit
- MCP servers support (Database, GitHub, etc.)

## Installation

```bash
composer require dykyi-roman/awesome-claude-code
```

Components auto-copy to `.claude/` directory.

## Key Commands

| Command | Purpose |
|---------|---------|
| `/acc-audit-architecture <path>` | Multi-pattern architecture audit |
| `/acc-audit-ddd <path>` | DDD compliance analysis |
| `/acc-audit-psr <path>` | PSR compliance audit |
| `/acc-audit-documentation <path>` | Audit documentation quality |
| `/acc-audit-claude-components` | Audit .claude folder structure |
| `/acc-generate-documentation <path>` | Generate documentation |
| `/acc-generate-claude-component` | Create commands/agents/skills |
| `/acc-commit` | Auto-generate commit message |
| `/acc-generate-test <path>` | Generate tests for file/folder |
| `/acc-audit-test <path>` | Audit test quality |
| `/acc-code-review [branch] [level]` | Multi-level code review |
| `/acc-bug-fix <target>` | Automated bug diagnosis and fix |
| `/acc-explain <path> [mode]` | Explain code: structure, logic, data flows |

## Agents

| Agent | Purpose |
|-------|---------|
| `acc-architecture-auditor` | Multi-pattern architecture auditor |
| `acc-ddd-auditor` | DDD compliance auditor |
| `acc-ddd-generator` | DDD component generator |
| `acc-pattern-generator` | Design pattern generator |
| `acc-psr-generator` | PSR implementation generator |
| `acc-documentation-writer` | Technical documentation writer |
| `acc-documentation-auditor` | Documentation quality auditor |
| `acc-diagram-designer` | Mermaid diagram designer |
| `acc-test-auditor` | Test quality auditor |
| `acc-test-generator` | Test generator |
| `acc-bug-fix-coordinator` | Bug diagnosis → fix → test workflow |
| `acc-bug-fixer` | Safe minimal bug fix generator |
| `acc-explain-coordinator` | Code explanation (5 modes) |
| `acc-codebase-navigator` | Structure scanning and pattern detection |
| `acc-business-logic-analyst` | Business rules and process extraction |
| `acc-data-flow-analyst` | Request lifecycle and data flow tracing |

## Skills by Category

### Knowledge (38)
- Architecture: DDD, CQRS, Clean, Hexagonal, Layered, EDA, Event Sourcing
- Patterns: Saga, Outbox, Stability (Circuit Breaker, Retry, Rate Limiter, Bulkhead), ADR
- Principles: SOLID, GRASP
- Standards: PSR-1/4/12, PSR overview
- Documentation: types, diagrams, QA
- Testing: principles, pyramid, DDD testing
- Bug Fix: categories, symptoms, fix patterns
- CI/CD: pipeline, tools, deployment
- Docker: core, multistage, base-images, php-extensions, compose, networking, security, buildkit, production, troubleshooting, orchestration, scanning
- Task Progress: coordinator tracking guidelines

### Analyzers (99)
- Architecture: SOLID violations, code smells, coupling/cohesion, bounded contexts, immutability, leaky abstractions, encapsulation
- Testing: test coverage, test smells
- Bug Detection: logic errors, null pointers, boundary, race conditions, resource leaks, exceptions, types, infinite loops
- Security: input validation, output encoding, authentication, authorization, sensitive data, CSRF, crypto, dependencies, SQL injection, SSRF, command injection, deserialization, XXE, path traversal, insecure design, logging failures, secure headers, CORS, mass assignment, type juggling
- Performance: N+1, query efficiency, memory, caching, loops, lazy loading, batch processing, complexity, connection pool, serialization, index usage, async patterns, file I/O
- DDD: aggregate consistency, CQRS alignment, context communication
- Documentation: link validation, code examples verification, version consistency
- Stability: timeout strategy, cascading failures, fallback strategy
- Creational: singleton anti-pattern, abstract factory audit
- Readability: naming, code style, method/class length, nesting, comments, magic values, consistency
- Testability: DI, pure functions, side effects, test quality
- CI/CD: CI config, CI logs, CI antipatterns
- Docker: build errors, runtime errors, image size, security, secrets, user permissions, compose config, production readiness, antipatterns, layer efficiency, PHP config, healthcheck
- Code Explainer: scan structure, identify entry points, detect architecture, resolve entry point, extract business rules, explain process, extract domain concepts, extract state machine, trace lifecycle, trace transformation, map async flows

### Generators (86)
- DDD: Value Objects, Entities, Aggregates, Domain Events, Repositories, Domain Services, Factories, Specifications, DTOs, Anti-Corruption Layer
- CQRS: Commands, Queries, Use Cases, Read Models
- Stability: Circuit Breaker, Retry, Rate Limiter, Bulkhead
- Integration: Saga, Outbox
- Behavioral: Strategy, State, Decorator, Chain of Responsibility, Null Object, Policy, Template Method, Visitor, Iterator, Memento
- GoF Structural: Adapter, Facade, Proxy, Composite, Bridge, Flyweight
- Creational: Builder, Object Pool, DI Container, Mediator, Prototype
- ADR: Action, Responder
- PSR: 3, 6, 7, 11, 13, 14, 15, 16, 17, 18, 20
- Testing: Unit tests, Integration tests, Builders, Mocks, Test doubles
- Bug Fix: minimal safe fix generator
- CI/CD: GitHub Actions, GitLab CI, PHPStan, Psalm, DEPTRAC, Rector, CI fix
- Docker: Dockerfile (production, dev, CI), dockerignore, Compose (dev, production), PHP config, healthcheck, entrypoint, nginx, makefile, env template, supervisor
- Docker Optimizers: layers, build time, image size, PHP-FPM, Compose resources, OPcache, startup
- Deployment: deploy strategy, feature flags

### Templates (10)
- README, Architecture, ADR, API docs
- Getting Started, Troubleshooting
- Code Examples, Mermaid diagrams, Changelog
- Explain output template

## Project Structure

```
.claude/
├── commands/        # Slash commands (26)
├── agents/          # Subagents (57)
├── skills/          # Knowledge + generators + analyzers (242)
└── settings.json    # Hooks and permissions
```

## Documentation

- Main README: [README.md](README.md)
- Detailed docs: [docs/](docs/)
- Changelog: [CHANGELOG.md](CHANGELOG.md)

## Usage Examples

```bash
# Audit architecture
/acc-audit-architecture ./src

# Generate documentation
/acc-generate-documentation ./src

# Check documentation quality
/acc-audit-documentation ./docs

# Create new DDD component
/acc-create-value-object Email

# Generate tests
/acc-generate-test ./src/Domain/Order/

# Audit test quality
/acc-audit-test ./tests

# Fix bug by description or file reference
/acc-bug-fix ./src/Domain/Order/Order.php:42
```

- GitHub: https://github.com/dykyi-roman/awesome-claude-code
- Packagist: https://packagist.org/packages/dykyi-roman/awesome-claude-code

## Version

v2.10.0 - Strengthen audit system: +21 skills, conditional rules, unified severity, audit levels
